title: Transition Risk Assessment
objective: Orient the learner to the 90-day framework by gauging relevance and perceived difficulty of common transition demands; compute a Transition Risk Index.

inputs.name: action
options: Moving to a new industry or profession
Moving to a new unit or group in the same company
Being promoted to a higher level
Leading former peers (assuming you have been promoted)
Moving from one function to another (e.g., sales to marketing)
Taking on a cross-functional leadership role for the first time
Entering a new national or ethnic culture
Having to do two jobs at the same time (finishing old role while starting new one)
Taking on a newly created role (as opposed to an existing role)
Entering an organization in which major change already is going on

inputs.name: relevance
inputs.label: Is this relevant to your current transition?

interpretation_buckets.label: Low
interpretation_buckets.guidance: Risks appear manageable; prioritize quick wins and stakeholder mapping.

interpretation_buckets.label: Moderate
interpretation_buckets.guidance: Target 2–3 risk clusters; time-box learning and secure early allies.

interpretation_buckets.label: High
interpretation_buckets.guidance: Sequence learning, limit scope, and tighten check-ins with sponsor.

next_steps: Review reading segments/templates aligned to highest-risk areas.
Schedule a short plan review with your sponsor.
